title: March Madness Is Awesome. Also NFL And NBA Things Happened
description:
We’re back to being half coherent but this weekend was awesome. Jake’s shining moments and a ton of other stuff. Also white boy summer.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
